content.question: The high proportion of women and children among the workers reflected in the table is best seen in the context of the

choices.label: low wages of workers in industrial societies
resistance of older male workers to being displaced by younger workers
persistence of guild regulations and other traditional restrictions on labor practices
decrease in family size associated with greater income

content.answer: low wages of workers in industrial societies

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
